Text:
Hi 20-40,
Thanks for the encode/upload.

Shame that this is the last in the season BUT at least is news is good for a 4th season. Producers should be making an announcement by end of today to confirm.

Cheers
Jon
Can you upload Jackie Chan movies in English language... Doesn't matter if its dubbed...

Thank you Jon and thank you JoSox.

@iamdk: All J.Chan movies are easy available, individually and as collections all over the Net, in all possible sizes and formats.
I have only two J. Chan movies in my personal collection: one is  "Gorgeous" (Chinese, English subtitles, never dubbed) 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0184526
but not because of Mr. Chan, but 'cause of miss Qi Shu, one of the prettiest womens alive.
Second one is in English, "Shanghai Noon"
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0184894
and most definitely both movies are the best Mr. J.Chan has ever done.
These two movies are the only candidates for encoding and upping.
ended so soon... thans heaps, great to see jesse finally grow some balls !
